    Interface IRootState

    Represents the root state of the application, managing slice states.

    Namespace: R3dux.Abstractions
    Assembly: R3dux.Abstractions.dll
    Syntax
    public interface IRootState

    ContainsKey(string)

    Determines whether the state contains an element with the specified key.

    Declaration
    bool ContainsKey(string key)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    string key

    The key to locate in the state.
    Returns
    Type Description
    bool

    true if the state contains an element with the key; otherwise, false.
